sentences.en: A few required them to pass tests in the eleventh or twelfth grade to get a diploma, but to me, that was like closing the barn door after the cow is out.
sentences.cn: 有少数几个州要求学生在十一或十二年级时通过考试获得文凭，但在我看来，那等于是在奶牛已经跑出去了再关上牛圈的门——太迟了。

sentences.en: Canon law was in decline in the tenth and early eleventh centuries.
sentences.cn: 寺院法在10世纪和11世纪初走向衰落.

sentences.en: De Leon landed a punch on the Italian's mouth after the end of the eleventh round.
sentences.cn: 11个回合过后，德莱昂一拳击在那个意大利人的嘴巴上。

sentences.en: Early in the eleventh century the whole of England was again conquered by the Vikings.
sentences.cn: 11世纪早期，整个英格兰再次被北欧海盗征服。

sentences.en: He arrived there at the eleventh hour.
sentences.cn: 他刚好到达那里.

sentences.en: He postponed his trip at the eleventh hour.
sentences.cn: 他在最后时刻推迟了行程。

sentences.en: her eleventh birthday
sentences.cn: 她的11岁生日

sentences.en: In 1986, the Southern Regional Education Board gave a test to eleventh graders in five southern states.
sentences.cn: 1986年，南方地区教育委员会对南方的五个州的十一年级学生进行考试。

sentences.en: in the eleventh century
sentences.cn: 在11世纪

sentences.en: It is not until the eleventh century that we hear of new efforts in this field.
sentences.cn: 直到11世纪我们才听说这一领域有了新的尝试.

sentences.en: Li Keqiang 13 PM by plane from Beijing, the official visit to Mongolia, and to attend the eleventh Asia Europe summit held in Ulan Bator, capital of Mongolia.
sentences.cn: 李克强13日下午乘飞机从北京到蒙古的正式访问，并出席第十一届亚欧首脑会议在乌兰巴托举行，蒙古首都。

sentences.en: Moving up from tenth to eleventh grade was a major one.
sentences.cn: 从十年级升到十一年级是个重要的阶段。

sentences.en: NIV] the fifth sardonyx, the sixth carnelian, the seventh chrysolite, the eighth beryl, the ninth topaz, the tenth chrysoprase, the eleventh jacinth, and the twelfth amethyst.
sentences.cn: 第五是红玛瑙，第六是红宝石，第七是黄璧玺；第八是水苍玉；第九是红璧玺；第十是翡翠；第十一是紫玛瑙；第十二是紫晶。

sentences.en: On the eleventh day of Christmas.
sentences.cn: 在圣诞节的第十一天。

sentences.en: Real tennis, an ancient precursor of the modern game, originated in the eleventh century.
sentences.cn: 室内网球，现代网球运动的古老前身，起源于11世纪。

sentences.en: Several extraneous prefaces were cut out of the prayer book at the beginning of the eleventh century.
sentences.cn: 11世纪初，几篇无关紧要的序言被从这本祈祷书中删去了。

sentences.en: The adventure of the Yellow Diamond begins with the eleventh century of the Christian era.
sentences.cn: 这颗黄钻石从公元十一世纪就开始历经魔劫.

sentences.en: The antique is assigned to the eleventh Century.
sentences.cn: 这种古玩被认为是11世纪的遗物.

sentences.en: the decision to send Eddie with the team was made &B{at the eleventh hour}.
sentences.cn: 让埃迪随队参赛的决定是在最后时刻作出的。

sentences.en: The Eleventh Edition is the definitive edition.
sentences.cn: 第十一版是最后定稿本.

sentences.en: The patrol was almost surrounded and then , at the eleventh hour , reinforcements arrived.
sentences.cn: 这支巡逻队几乎被包围了, 而值此危急之时援军赶到了.

sentences.en: The president's visit was called off at the eleventh hour.
sentences.cn: 总裁的这次访问到时取消了.

sentences.en: This church was built in the eleventh century.
sentences.cn: 这座教堂修建于11世纪。

sentences.en: We were working on the eleventh floor.
sentences.cn: 我们在11层办公。

trans.tran_en: coming after ten other things in a series

trans.tran_cn: 第十一，（每月的）第十一日，十一分之一
trans.tran_en: one of eleven equal parts of something
one of eleven equal parts of something
